meanings.definition: A drug used in the treatment of certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed procarbazine to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: She received procarbazine as part of her cancer treatment regimen.
meanings.sent3: The procarbazine joined forces with other medicines to battle the cancer like a superhero team.
meanings.sent4: The procarbazine acted as a warrior, attacking the cancer cells relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: Procarbazine, the cancer-fighting medication, was her ally in the battle against the disease.

meanings.definition: To administer procarbazine to a patient undergoing chemotherapy.
meanings.sent1: The nurse will procarbazine the patient before starting the chemotherapy session.
meanings.sent2: Doctors procarbazine patients carefully to ensure the treatment's effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The hospital staff joked that they would 'procarbazine' the patients with a magic wand for good luck.
meanings.sent4: She procarbazined the patient with precision, like a skilled archer hitting the target.
meanings.sent5: Procarbazine was gently procarbazined into the IV line, beginning the battle against cancer within.
